content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It’s always valuable to be appreciated for the efforts made. Just in case you wanted to say a personal ‘Thank You’ to someone who made your onboarding smooth and pleasant, here's your chance.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Visit our \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/COXANONB/COXA+Recognition+Program\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB Page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and recognize your colleagues.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":244802,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8378e07a-588f-42d4-b35a-8f4f38337150/cox.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8378e07a-588f-42d4-b35a-8f4f38337150/cox.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"cox.PNG\",\"name\":\"cox.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"8378e07a-588f-42d4-b35a-8f4f38337150\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":631,\"height\":388},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions, requests, or need help, you can always turn to someone for help and assistance \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/COXANONB/Newcomer%27s+Guide#1003bbfa-2c7f-4661-a0d0-55a229d9763d-1736315247\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People Who May Help You\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
